comment: Lemma for ~ lgseisen . If ` R ( u ) = ( Q x. u ) mod P ` and ` M ( u ) = ( -u 1 ^ R ( u ) ) x. R ( u ) ` , then for any even ` 1 <_ u <_ P - 1 ` , ` M ( u ) ` is also an even integer ` 1 <_ M ( u ) <_ P - 1 ` . To simplify these statements, we divide all the even numbers by ` 2 ` , so that it becomes the statement that ` M ( x / 2 ) = ( -u 1 ^ R ( x / 2 ) ) x. R ( x / 2 ) / 2 ` is an integer between ` 1 ` and ` ( P - 1 ) / 2 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2015.)
